Texts.Chs: 要制作属于你的兜帽，你需要将六个诺克石锭、一个沃尔坦核心和一个远古核心放入祭坛，然后颂唱Horvalaatsh的咒文。
Texts.Eng: ...and that is why your robe is never to be used in lieu of toilet paper. You'd not want that, right? As for your hood, which you of course already made using 6 Nocxium, a Valtan Casin and an Elder Core...well, just be sure you don't go using that, either...

Texts.Chs: 关于信徒服饰的获取指南
Texts.Eng: A cultists guide to proper hood attire

Texts.Chs: 信徒真正的服饰 - 兜帽
